37 #include <cmath>
38 #include <moveit/pointcloud_octomap_updater/pointcloud_octomap_updater.h>
39 #include <moveit/occupancy_map_monitor/occupancy_map_monitor.h>

41 #include <tf2/LinearMath/Vector3.h>
42 #include <tf2/LinearMath/Transform.h>

44 #include <XmlRpcException.h>

48 namespace occupancy_map_monitor
49 {
50 static const std::string LOGNAME = "occupancy_map_monitor";
51 PointCloudOctomapUpdater::PointCloudOctomapUpdater()
52  : OccupancyMapUpdater("PointCloudUpdater")
53  , private_nh_("~")
54  , scale_(1.0)
55  , padding_(0.0)
56  , max_range_(std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity())
57  , point_subsample_(1)
58  , max_update_rate_(0)
59  , point_cloud_subscriber_(nullptr)
60  , point_cloud_filter_(nullptr)
61 {
62 }
63 
64 PointCloudOctomapUpdater::~PointCloudOctomapUpdater()
65 {
66  stopHelper();
67 }
68 
69 bool PointCloudOctomapUpdater::setParams(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue& params)
70 {
71  try
72  {
73  if (!params.hasMember("point_cloud_topic"))
74  return false;
75  point_cloud_topic_ = static_cast<const std::string&>(params["point_cloud_topic"]);
76 
77  readXmlParam(params, "max_range", &max_range_);
78  readXmlParam(params, "padding_offset", &padding_);
79  readXmlParam(params, "padding_scale", &scale_);
80  readXmlParam(params, "point_subsample", &point_subsample_);
81  if (params.hasMember("max_update_rate"))
82  readXmlParam(params, "max_update_rate", &max_update_rate_);
83  if (params.hasMember("filtered_cloud_topic"))
84  filtered_cloud_topic_ = static_cast<const std::string&>(params["filtered_cloud_topic"]);
85  }
86  catch (XmlRpc::XmlRpcException& ex)
87  {
88  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "XmlRpc Exception: " << ex.getMessage());
89  return false;
90  }
91 
92  return true;
93 }
94 
95 bool PointCloudOctomapUpdater::initialize()
96 {
97  tf_buffer_ = std::make_shared<tf2_ros::Buffer>();
98  tf_listener_ = std::make_shared<tf2_ros::TransformListener>(*tf_buffer_, root_nh_);
99  shape_mask_ = std::make_unique<point_containment_filter::ShapeMask>();
100  shape_mask_->setTransformCallback(boost::bind(&PointCloudOctomapUpdater::getShapeTransform, this, _1, _2));
101  if (!filtered_cloud_topic_.empty())
102  filtered_cloud_publisher_ = private_nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(filtered_cloud_topic_, 10, false);
103  return true;
104 }
105 
106 void PointCloudOctomapUpdater::start()
107 {
108  if (point_cloud_subscriber_)
109  return;
110  /* subscribe to point cloud topic using tf filter*/
111  point_cloud_subscriber_ = new message_filters::Subscriber<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(root_nh_, point_cloud_topic_, 5);
112  if (tf_listener_ && tf_buffer_ && !monitor_->getMapFrame().empty())
113  {
114  point_cloud_filter_ = new tf2_ros::MessageFilter<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(*point_cloud_subscriber_, *tf_buffer_,
115  monitor_->getMapFrame(), 5, root_nh_);
116  point_cloud_filter_->registerCallback(boost::bind(&PointCloudOctomapUpdater::cloudMsgCallback, this, _1));
117  ROS_INFO_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Listening to '%s' using message filter with target frame '%s'", point_cloud_topic_.c_str(),
118  point_cloud_filter_->getTargetFramesString().c_str());
119  }
120  else
121  {
122  point_cloud_subscriber_->registerCallback(boost::bind(&PointCloudOctomapUpdater::cloudMsgCallback, this, _1));
123  ROS_INFO_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Listening to '%s'", point_cloud_topic_.c_str());
124  }
125 }
126 
127 void PointCloudOctomapUpdater::stopHelper()
128 {
129  delete point_cloud_filter_;
130  delete point_cloud_subscriber_;
131 }
132 
133 void PointCloudOctomapUpdater::stop()
134 {
135  stopHelper();
136  point_cloud_filter_ = nullptr;
137  point_cloud_subscriber_ = nullptr;
138 }
139 
140 ShapeHandle PointCloudOctomapUpdater::excludeShape(const shapes::ShapeConstPtr& shape)
141 {
142  ShapeHandle h = 0;
143  if (shape_mask_)
144  h = shape_mask_->addShape(shape, scale_, padding_);
145  else
146  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Shape filter not yet initialized!");
147  return h;
148 }
149 
150 void PointCloudOctomapUpdater::forgetShape(ShapeHandle handle)
151 {
152  if (shape_mask_)
153  shape_mask_->removeShape(handle);
154 }
155 
156 bool PointCloudOctomapUpdater::getShapeTransform(ShapeHandle h, Eigen::Isometry3d& transform) const
157 {
158  ShapeTransformCache::const_iterator it = transform_cache_.find(h);
159  if (it != transform_cache_.end())
160  {
161  transform = it->second;
162  }
163  return it != transform_cache_.end();
164 }
165 
166 void PointCloudOctomapUpdater::updateMask(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2& /*cloud*/,
167  const Eigen::Vector3d& /*sensor_origin*/, std::vector<int>& /*mask*/)
168 {
169 }
170 
171 void PointCloudOctomapUpdater::cloudMsgCallback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr& cloud_msg)
172 {
173  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Received a new point cloud message");
174  ros::WallTime start = ros::WallTime::now();
175 
176  if (max_update_rate_ > 0)
177  {
178  // ensure we are not updating the octomap representation too often
179  if (ros::Time::now() - last_update_time_ <= ros::Duration(1.0 / max_update_rate_))
180  return;
181  last_update_time_ = ros::Time::now();
182  }
183 
184  if (monitor_->getMapFrame().empty())
185  monitor_->setMapFrame(cloud_msg->header.frame_id);
186 
187  /* get transform for cloud into map frame */
188  tf2::Stamped<tf2::Transform> map_h_sensor;
189  if (monitor_->getMapFrame() == cloud_msg->header.frame_id)
190  map_h_sensor.setIdentity();
191  else
192  {
193  if (tf_buffer_)
194  {
195  try
196  {
197  tf2::fromMsg(tf_buffer_->lookupTransform(monitor_->getMapFrame(), cloud_msg->header.frame_id,
198  cloud_msg->header.stamp),
199  map_h_sensor);
200  }
201  catch (tf2::TransformException& ex)
202  {
203  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Transform error of sensor data: " << ex.what() << "; quitting callback");
204  return;
205  }
206  }
207  else
208  return;
209  }
210 
211  /* compute sensor origin in map frame */
212  const tf2::Vector3& sensor_origin_tf = map_h_sensor.getOrigin();
213  octomap::point3d sensor_origin(sensor_origin_tf.getX(), sensor_origin_tf.getY(), sensor_origin_tf.getZ());
214  Eigen::Vector3d sensor_origin_eigen(sensor_origin_tf.getX(), sensor_origin_tf.getY(), sensor_origin_tf.getZ());
215 
216  if (!updateTransformCache(cloud_msg->header.frame_id, cloud_msg->header.stamp))
217  return;
218 
219  /* mask out points on the robot */
220  shape_mask_->maskContainment(*cloud_msg, sensor_origin_eigen, 0.0, max_range_, mask_);
221  updateMask(*cloud_msg, sensor_origin_eigen, mask_);
222 
223  octomap::KeySet free_cells, occupied_cells, model_cells, clip_cells;
224  std::unique_ptr<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> filtered_cloud;
225 
226  // We only use these iterators if we are creating a filtered_cloud for
227  // publishing. We cannot default construct these, so we use unique_ptr's
228  // to defer construction
229  std::unique_ptr<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float>> iter_filtered_x;
230  std::unique_ptr<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float>> iter_filtered_y;
231  std::unique_ptr<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float>> iter_filtered_z;
232 
233  if (!filtered_cloud_topic_.empty())
234  {
235  filtered_cloud = std::make_unique<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>();
236  filtered_cloud->header = cloud_msg->header;
237  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Modifier pcd_modifier(*filtered_cloud);
238  pcd_modifier.setPointCloud2FieldsByString(1, "xyz");
239  pcd_modifier.resize(cloud_msg->width * cloud_msg->height);
240 
241  // we have created a filtered_out, so we can create the iterators now
242  iter_filtered_x = std::make_unique<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float>>(*filtered_cloud, "x");
243  iter_filtered_y = std::make_unique<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float>>(*filtered_cloud, "y");
244  iter_filtered_z = std::make_unique<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float>>(*filtered_cloud, "z");
245  }
246  size_t filtered_cloud_size = 0;
247 
248  tree_->lockRead();
249 
250  try
251  {
252  /* do ray tracing to find which cells this point cloud indicates should be free, and which it indicates
253  * should be occupied */
254  for (unsigned int row = 0; row < cloud_msg->height; row += point_subsample_)
255  {
256  unsigned int row_c = row * cloud_msg->width;
257  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2ConstIterator<float> pt_iter(*cloud_msg, "x");
258  // set iterator to point at start of the current row
259  pt_iter += row_c;
260 
261  for (unsigned int col = 0; col < cloud_msg->width; col += point_subsample_, pt_iter += point_subsample_)
262  {
263  // if (mask_[row_c + col] == point_containment_filter::ShapeMask::CLIP)
264  // continue;
265 
266  /* check for NaN */
267  if (!std::isnan(pt_iter[0]) && !std::isnan(pt_iter[1]) && !std::isnan(pt_iter[2]))
268  {
269  /* occupied cell at ray endpoint if ray is shorter than max range and this point
270  isn't on a part of the robot*/
271  if (mask_[row_c + col] == point_containment_filter::ShapeMask::INSIDE)
272  {
273  // transform to map frame
274  tf2::Vector3 point_tf = map_h_sensor * tf2::Vector3(pt_iter[0], pt_iter[1], pt_iter[2]);
275  model_cells.insert(tree_->coordToKey(point_tf.getX(), point_tf.getY(), point_tf.getZ()));
276  }
277  else if (mask_[row_c + col] == point_containment_filter::ShapeMask::CLIP)
278  {
279  tf2::Vector3 clipped_point_tf =
280  map_h_sensor * (tf2::Vector3(pt_iter[0], pt_iter[1], pt_iter[2]).normalize() * max_range_);
281  clip_cells.insert(
282  tree_->coordToKey(clipped_point_tf.getX(), clipped_point_tf.getY(), clipped_point_tf.getZ()));
283  }
284  else
285  {
286  tf2::Vector3 point_tf = map_h_sensor * tf2::Vector3(pt_iter[0], pt_iter[1], pt_iter[2]);
287  occupied_cells.insert(tree_->coordToKey(point_tf.getX(), point_tf.getY(), point_tf.getZ()));
288  // build list of valid points if we want to publish them
289  if (filtered_cloud)
290  {
291  **iter_filtered_x = pt_iter[0];
292  **iter_filtered_y = pt_iter[1];
293  **iter_filtered_z = pt_iter[2];
294  ++filtered_cloud_size;
295  ++*iter_filtered_x;
296  ++*iter_filtered_y;
297  ++*iter_filtered_z;
298  }
299  }
300  }
301  }
302  }
303 
304  /* compute the free cells along each ray that ends at an occupied cell */
305  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& occupied_cell : occupied_cells)
306  if (tree_->computeRayKeys(sensor_origin, tree_->keyToCoord(occupied_cell), key_ray_))
307  free_cells.insert(key_ray_.begin(), key_ray_.end());
308 
309  /* compute the free cells along each ray that ends at a model cell */
310  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& model_cell : model_cells)
311  if (tree_->computeRayKeys(sensor_origin, tree_->keyToCoord(model_cell), key_ray_))
312  free_cells.insert(key_ray_.begin(), key_ray_.end());
313 
314  /* compute the free cells along each ray that ends at a clipped cell */
315  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& clip_cell : clip_cells)
316  if (tree_->computeRayKeys(sensor_origin, tree_->keyToCoord(clip_cell), key_ray_))
317  free_cells.insert(key_ray_.begin(), key_ray_.end());
318  }
319  catch (...)
320  {
321  tree_->unlockRead();
322  return;
323  }
324 
325  tree_->unlockRead();
326 
327  /* cells that overlap with the model are not occupied */
328  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& model_cell : model_cells)
329  occupied_cells.erase(model_cell);
330 
331  /* occupied cells are not free */
332  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& occupied_cell : occupied_cells)
333  free_cells.erase(occupied_cell);
334 
335  tree_->lockWrite();
336 
337  try
338  {
339  /* mark free cells only if not seen occupied in this cloud */
340  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& free_cell : free_cells)
341  tree_->updateNode(free_cell, false);
342 
343  /* now mark all occupied cells */
344  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& occupied_cell : occupied_cells)
345  tree_->updateNode(occupied_cell, true);
346 
347  // set the logodds to the minimum for the cells that are part of the model
348  const float lg = tree_->getClampingThresMinLog() - tree_->getClampingThresMaxLog();
349  for (const octomap::OcTreeKey& model_cell : model_cells)
350  tree_->updateNode(model_cell, lg);
351  }
352  catch (...)
353  {
354  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Internal error while updating octree");
355  }
356  tree_->unlockWrite();
357  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Processed point cloud in %lf ms", (ros::WallTime::now() - start).toSec() * 1000.0);
358  tree_->triggerUpdateCallback();
359 
360  if (filtered_cloud)
361  {
362  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Modifier pcd_modifier(*filtered_cloud);
363  pcd_modifier.resize(filtered_cloud_size);
364  filtered_cloud_publisher_.publish(*filtered_cloud);
365  }
366 }
367 } // namespace occupancy_map_monitor
